description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0. This issue affects some unknown processing of the file /view/student_payment_details2.php. The manipulation of the argument index leads to sql injection. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-265097 was assigned to this vulnerability.
